devdoc.details: This contract will be used to track Reaction NFTs in the protocol. Only the NFT Minter role can mint tokens Only the NFT Burner role can burn tokens Note: This contract is protected via a permissioned account set in the role manager.  Caution should be used as the role owner could renounce the role leaving all future actions disabled.  Additionally, if a malicious account was able to obtain the role, they could use it to mint or burn reactions. See the public documentation website for more details.

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

burn(address,uint256,uint256).details: Allows reaction burner role to burn tokens

initialize(string,address,string).details: initializer to call after deployment, can only be called once

mint(address,uint256,uint256,bytes).details: Allows reaction minter role to mint tokens

uri(uint256).details: See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the EIP]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\{id\}` substring with the actual token type ID.

devdoc.title: ReactionNft1155
